bibl.title: Ἀντιφίλησις. Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou
bibl.note: Tient compte des témoignages papyrologiques, en part. P. Oxy. XVII, 2083 (= M.-P.3 2073; LDAB 5823).
KARLA Grammatiki A., Die älteste Version des Äsopromans.

Eleni KARAMALENGOU and Eugenia D. MAKRYGIANNI (Edd.), Ἀντιφίλησις. Studies on Classical, Byzantine and Modern Greek Literature and Culture in Honour of John-Theophanes A. Papademetriou (Stuttgart, 2009) pp. 442-452.
